overview: SeeZee Studios provides a full spectrum of technology services, anchored by real support and consulting, with advanced capabilities in web, software, and automation.

services.name: Live Technical Support
services.description: On-site and remote help for real-world technical issues. PC/Mac troubleshooting, network issues, device setup, software problems, emergency fixes.
details: On-site support for schools, nonprofits, and local organizations
services.differentiator: This is our anchor. Real experience in real environments, not just theory.

services.name: Technology Consulting
services.description: Decision-making support, not just advice. What systems should you use? How do you modernize? How do you automate? What should you stop paying for?
services.differentiator: Frames us as a trusted advisor, not a repair guy or sales pitch.

services.name: Web & Software Systems
services.description: Websites, internal tools, dashboards, and digital infrastructure. Built as part of a larger system, not standalone projects.
details: Custom websites with Next.js and modern frameworks
services.differentiator: We don't just 'make websites.' We build systems that work as part of your organization's infrastructure.

services.name: Automation & AI Solutions
services.description: Practical automation and AI tools that support real workflows. Offered once trust exists, never as the lead.
details: AI assistants for specific use cases
services.differentiator: AI used only where it adds real value. Never hype-first, never AI-for-AI's-sake.

audiences.name: Schools & Education
audiences.description: K-12 schools, districts, and educational organizations needing reliable tech support and modern systems.

audiences.name: Nonprofits
audiences.description: Mission-driven organizations that need technology to work without enterprise budgets.

audiences.name: Community Organizations
audiences.description: Local groups, faith-based organizations, and service providers serving their communities.

audiences.name: Local Businesses
audiences.description: Small and local businesses that value long-term relationships over one-time transactions.
